pages.title: Amethyst Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Amethyst Armour you will need one Infused Amethyst per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Amethyst goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Amethyst Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Amethyst Armour to Gain a Permenant Night Vision Boost
